title: Imanol Alguacil appointed as new Al Shabab head coach - Football | Tribuna.com
snippet: Imanol Alguacil has been officially appointed as the new manager of Saudi Pro League side Al Shabab. The Basque coach arrived in Riyadh earlier this week and, after finalizing the final details of his contract, signed a two-year deal with the ...

title: Al-Shabab FC - Current and former staff | Transfermarkt
Al Shabab appoint Turkish legend Fatih Terim
snippet: Roshn Saudi League side Al Shabab announced on Saturday the appointment of Turkish icon Fatih Terim is new head coach, replacing Vitor Pereira in the dugout of the Riyadh club.

title: Al Shabab Club - Wikipedia
snippet: Al-Shabab Saudi Football Club also known as Al-Shabab (Arabic: نادي الشباب لكرة القدم, romanized: nādī al-shabaab li-kurat al-qadam, lit. 'The Youth Football Club') is a Saudi Arabian professional football club based in Riyadh that competes in the Saudi Pro League.

title: Fatih Terim appointed head coach of Saudi's Al Shabab
snippet: Saudi Club Al Shabab appointed Fatih Terim as their head coach on Friday.
